title: Come check us out! $1000 special on all units! Net effective: $2378.08
posting_body: ['Stoneridge Apartments', '6250 Stoneridge Mall Road , Pleasanton, CA, 94588', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 130', 'OR Text', '130', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to Stoneridge Apartments', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 731 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Refine the way you live with Stoneridge.', 'Settled in northwest Pleasanton, CA, this garden-style community offers residents a charming and relaxing environment to call home.', 'Comfort extends beyond the bounds of your apartment with premium amenities throughout the community.', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs Ok - Woof!', 'Cats Ok- Meow!', 'Income Requirements:', '2.7 times the monthly rent', 'We take co-signors!', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:11:00AM-5:00PM', 'lw7NeRrzq5']
